mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pub_news ( new_title, new_content, new_createtime, new_createuser, cpy_id, new_click, new_type, new_is_check, new_is_show ) VALUES ( #{newTitle}, #{newContent}, #{newCreateTime}, #{newCreateUser}, #{cpyId}, #{newClick}, #{newType}, #{newIsCheck}, #{newIsShow} )
mapper.sql: id, new_title AS newTitle, new_content AS newContent, new_createtime AS newCreatetime, new_createuser AS newCreateuser, cpy_id AS cpyId, new_click AS newClick, new_type AS newType, new_is_check AS newIsCheck, new_is_delstatus AS newIsDelstatus, new_is_show AS newIsShow
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pub_news
ORDER BY new_is_delstatus DESC, new_is_check DESC, new_createtime DESC, new_is_show DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE pub_news SET new_title = #{newTitle}, new_content = #{newContent}, new_type = #{newType} WHERE id = #{id}
